hero.title: Professional Coaching,
hero.subtitle: Personalized training programs designed to help you achieve your fitness goals with expert guidance, tailored plans, and ongoing support.

about.title: Dedicated to Your
about.description: With over 6 years of experience in fitness coaching and bodybuilding, I've helped hundreds of clients achieve their transformation goals. My approach combines personalized training programs, nutrition guidance, and ongoing support to ensure lasting results.

services.title: Professional Coaching
services.description: Choose from a range of personalized coaching services designed to help you achieve your fitness goals.

items.title: Personal Training
items.description: One-on-one coaching sessions tailored to your fitness level and goals

items.title: Online Coaching
items.description: Remote coaching with full support and guidance from anywhere in the world

items.title: Nutrition Planning
items.description: Customized meal plans and nutrition strategies for optimal results

items.title: Body Transformation
items.description: Complete transformation programs for dramatic, lasting results

process.title: How It Works
process.description: Getting started is simple. Follow these three steps to begin your transformation journey.

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: We discuss your goals, history, and create your custom plan

steps.title: Personalized Program
steps.description: Get your tailored workout and nutrition strategy

steps.title: Ongoing Support
steps.description: Regular check-ins, adjustments, and continuous guidance

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Let's discuss your fitness goals and create a personalized plan to help you achieve them.

info.infoDescription: Have questions? Reach out through the form or use the contact details below. I typically respond within 24 hours.

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about your fitness goals and what you're looking to achieve...

validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

success.title: Message Sent!
success.description: Thank you for reaching out. I'll get back to you within 24 hours.

consultation.title: Free Consultation
consultation.description: Schedule a free 30-minute consultation to discuss your goals and see if we're a good fit.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: David's coaching transformed not just my body, but my entire lifestyle. His personalized approach and constant support made all the difference.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.content: The posing coaching was invaluable for my first competition. David's expertise helped me feel confident on stage and achieve a top 3 placement.

items.name: Emma Williams
items.content: I've worked with several trainers, but David's knowledge and dedication are unmatched. He truly cares about your success.

cards.title: Where It All Started
cards.description: My journey began with a passion for fitness and a desire to help others achieve their goals. Starting from the basics, I learned the fundamentals of training and nutrition.

cards.title: The Transformation
cards.description: Through dedication, consistency, and continuous learning, I transformed my body and my mindset. This journey taught me the importance of personalized approaches to fitness.

cards.title: Today
cards.description: Now, as a certified coach with years of experience, I help others achieve their transformation goals through proven methods and personalized coaching.

cta.title: Ready to Transform
cta.description: Join hundreds of satisfied clients who have achieved their fitness goals with personalized coaching and proven methods.

featureDescriptions.0: Every program is tailored to your unique goals and fitness level
featureDescriptions.1: Join hundreds of clients who have achieved their fitness goals
featureDescriptions.2: Get guidance and motivation throughout your entire journey

footer.tagline: I will help you create a better version of you. We are working together for your results with personalized coaching and proven training programs.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to Newsletter
newsletter.description: Get fitness tips, workout ideas, and exclusive offers.
